welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Two Rivers, USA! Get ready to experience the charming coastal city known for its breathtaking views, quaint shops and delicious seafood. We invite you to make the most of your stay and savor all that Two Rivers has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport handles all commercial flights and includes amenities such as restaurants, shops, and rental car services.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Municipal Airport is used for private and charter flights and offers a more exclusive and personalized experience for travelers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
